subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin scored his second goal of the game with 10.7 seconds left in overtime Tuesday night and the surging Washington Capitals captured a 5-4 victory over the host Islanders.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin scored his second goal of the game with 10.7 seconds left in overtime Tuesday night and the surging Washington Capitals captured a 5-4 victory over the host Islanders.
